patterns: Chief Minister's Young Entrepreneur Development Campaign
responses: The Chief Minister's Young Entrepreneur Development Campaign is a government initiative aimed at promoting entrepreneurship among the youth. It provides financial support, guidance, and training. Visit the official site: CMYUVA Home

Age: 21 to 40 years. Educational qualification: Minimum 8th grade. Skill-related certificate, diploma, or degree from a recognized institution is required.
Self-employment opportunities to 1 lakh youth annually. Interest-free and collateral-free loan up to Rs. 5 lakh. 10% margin money subsidy on the project cost.

patterns: Explain the focus and benefits of CMYUVA
responses: Target: Youth aged 18 to 40. Support includes financial help, training, and loans. Focus areas: Manufacturing, services, etc. Benefits: Economic empowerment, equal opportunities, and a culture of entrepreneurship.

patterns: What documents are needed for CMYUVA?
Which papers are needed for application?
responses: Skill Certificates, Training Certificates, Computer Certificate, PAN Card, address proof, project report, bank passbook, notarized affidavit, photo, signature, and educational proof.

ODOP (One District One Product) promotes a unique product from each district to boost local economies. It supports traditional industries, creates jobs, improves quality, and enhances marketing, helping increase exports while preserving cultural heritage. Visit: ODOP Portal

VSSY (Vishesh Shilpi Samman Yojana) supports traditional artisans such as carpenters, tailors, barbers, and others by providing financial aid and training to improve their skills and livelihoods. Visit: VSSY Portal

CM Yuva is a youth empowerment initiative by the Uttar Pradesh government providing skill development, entrepreneurship training, and financial support to youth. It focuses on education, employment, and innovation.
Agriloan refers to financial products offered by banks to support agricultural activities. These include Crop Loans, Kisan Credit Cards (KCC), Term Loans, Allied Activity Loans, and Agri Gold Loans.
UP MSME 1-Connect is a digital platform under the RAMP program offering access to schemes, financial support, training, and export help. Visit: MSME1Connect Portal
Udyam Registration is an online system for registering MSMEs in India. It simplifies the process and replaces the older systems like EM-II and UAM. Visit: Udyam Registration Portal
MSMEs are Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises based on investment and turnover. They are vital to India's economy. Visit: MSME Government Website
UPDESCO is a state-run IT services agency. You can register your business here: UPSDC Portal

patterns: Tell me about the documents required
responses: Documents include skill certificates, training certificates, PAN card, photo, signature, project report, and educational proof.
Hello! Welcome to the OSEM chatbot. How can I help you today?
Mission Shakti is a women's empowerment initiative with safety ('Sambal') and development ('Samarthya') components, covering helplines, support centers, and training programs.

patterns: What are the phases of Mission Shakti?
Explain the phases of Mission Shakti
responses: Mission Shakti is implemented in phases focusing on protection, empowerment, and grassroots outreach for women.

patterns: Tell me about Self Help Groups
How do women benefit from SHGs?
What is the role of SHGs?
responses: Self-Help Groups (SHGs) empower women through entrepreneurship, access to credit, and training programs under Mission Shakti.
Mission Shakti provides vocational training, digital literacy, and self-defense workshops for women.

patterns: How can I file a complaint?
responses: File complaints via 181 or 1090, or visit the nearest One Stop Centre.
Thank you for using the chatbot. Stay safe and empowered!

patterns: How can you support business growth?
What services do you offer at each stage of a business?
responses: We deliver value to your business at every stage, from inception to growth. Our services are designed to support your business through every phase startup, operations, and expansion

patterns: How does MSME OSEM help small businesses?
responses: At MSME OSEM, we are dedicated to making small business management seamless and stress-free. Our platform simplifies every stage of your entrepreneurial journey whether you're launching, managing, or scaling. For more information, visit: MSME OSEM Website

patterns: Do you help with launching a business?
Can you help with scaling my business?
What help do you offer to entrepreneurs?
responses: With expert guidance, innovative technology, and user-friendly tools, we empower business owners to focus on building successful and sustainable enterprises.Whether you're starting, running, or growing your business, we provide seamless support tailored to your needs.

patterns: What features does your platform offer?
How can your platform help me?
Do you offer technology or tools for business management?
responses: Our platform includes tools and resources for financial management, marketing support, operations, and growth planning.We provide all-in-one solutions to help you thrive in todays competitive business landscape.

patterns: how can I meet my expert?
I want to schedule a meeting with an expert
how to contact MSME OSEM expert
how can we reach MSME OSEM expert
responses: You can connect with our expert panel by visiting the official MSME OSEM Expert Panel page: Meet Our Experts. There you will find detailed profiles and options to get in touch or schedule appointments.
To book an appointment or register as an expert, please head to our expert section here: Expert Panel.
For expert registration or to reach an MSME OSEM expert, please visit: Expert Panel.

patterns: tell me about MSME OSEM workshop
where can I find msme events?
how can I join msme workshop?
responses: You can find all upcoming MSME OSEM workshops and events here: MSME OSEM Events.
To know about MSME workshops, seminars, and training sessions, please visit: MSME OSEM Events Page.
Stay updated on all MSME OSEM activities and events by checking our events page: View Events.

patterns: how to register on MSME OSEM?
responses: To register as a user on MSME OSEM, please visit the User Registration page: User Registration. This will give you access to various resources and tools to support your business growth.

You can contact MSME OSEM at:
- Phone: 0522 423 3727
- Email: info@msmeosem.in
- Address: A-708-709, 7th Floor, Rohtas Summit Building, Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010

UPICON (UP Industrial Consultants Limited) empowers MSMEs and entrepreneurs in Uttar Pradesh through skill development, financial aid, and consultancy. Our mission is to build a sustainable business ecosystem.
UPICON supports small businesses with training, banking inclusion, and government‑program facilitation to drive socio‑economic growth.

patterns: What is UPICON's registered office address?
responses: Registered Office: 5th Floor, Kabir Bhawan, G. T. Road, Kanpur – 208002, Uttar Pradesh Corporate Office: A‑708‑709, 7th Floor, Rohtas Summit Building, Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow – 226 010.
General enquiries – Email: info@upicon.in | Phone: 0522 423 3727
Banking support – Email: fi.up@upicon.in | Other queries: mdoffice@upicon.in
UPICON offers: 1) Skill‑development programmes, 2) Banking‑inclusion support, 3) Marketing workshops, 4) Call‑centre assistance for entrepreneurs.
We provide end‑to‑end project execution, government‑scheme facilitation, and women‑empowerment initiatives.

patterns: How many branches does UPICON have?
responses: Founded in 1974, UPICON now has six branches: Kanpur, Lucknow, Bhopal, Prayagraj, Patna, and Noida.
UPICON started in Kanpur and expanded pan‑India to support MSMEs with technology‑driven solutions.
UP Industrial Consultants Limited.

patterns: How does UPICON help rural development?
responses: UPICON addresses challenges such as skill gaps, financial exclusion, and lack of market access for MSMEs through training and consultancy.
We focus on rural entrepreneurship, women empowerment, and adopting AI/IoT for sustainable growth.
UPICON manages projects end‑to‑end with detailed plans, field workers, and government collaborations.
We provide micro‑business ecosystem support, workforce development, and social‑welfare project implementation.

patterns: What is the full form of OSEM?
responses: The full form of OSEM is Online System for Enterprise Management.
OSEM Lucknow is at A‑708‑709, 7th Floor, Rohtas Summit Building, Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow – 226 010, Uttar Pradesh.

patterns: How to contact OSEM by phone?
responses: You can reach OSEM at 0522 423 3727 during business hours.

patterns: What are the key features of OSEM?
responses:
OSEM offers these key features:
1. Enterprise‑management platform with business‑process automation
2. Real‑time analytics for data‑driven decisions
3. Customisable modules for multiple industries
4. Secure, scalable cloud integration
5. User‑friendly dashboard
6. Omnichannel customer‑engagement tools
7. Built‑in government‑scheme support
8. Specialised MSME tools

patterns: Tell me about Youth Adda program
responses: Youth Adda is an innovative platform powered by UPICON, dedicated to empowering the youth of Uttar Pradesh with the tools, guidance, and resources they need to become successful business leaders. Whether you're looking for expert business advice, financial assistance, or unique startup ideas – Youth Adda is your one-stop destination.Our mission is to nurture entrepreneurial talent, drive innovation, and contribute to the economic development of the state. At Youth Adda, you can explore, discuss, and shape your dream business ideas – all in one place.
Youth Adda Address: Shop no M32, Vibhuti Khand, Gomti Nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226010

patterns: How to register for Youth Adda?
responses: Register/Login or schedule a visit in four steps: 1. Go to MSME OSEM Youth Adda 2. Complete the online form 3. Receive confirmation with your Youth Adda ID 4. Book a centre‑visit slot online. Need help? Call 0522 423 3727 (Ext. 3) or email youth.adda@upicon.in.
You can register for our e-Learning programs by visiting our website: UPICON e-Learnings For any assistance with registration, you can contact us at: 📧 info@upicon.in 📞 0522 423 3727

To register for e-Learning courses: 1. Visit our portal: UPICON e-Learnings 2. Browse available courses 3. Click on 'Register' or 'Enroll Now' 4. Complete the registration form Need help? Contact us at info@upicon.in or call 0522 423 3727

Understanding the difference between self-employment and entrepreneurship is crucial for young professionals, as both career paths offer distinct perspectives and opportunities. While self-employment involves managing one's own business and having direct control over income, entrepreneurship focuses on innovation, expansion, and making a large-scale impact. Enhance Your Skills with UPICON If you want to develop your professional skills and move towards self-employment or entrepreneurship, UPICON's courses can be your perfect guiding tool. Why Choose UPICON? - Live and Recorded Courses: Learn through live sessions or recorded lessons at your convenience. - Mentorship from Industry Experts: Gain insights and guidance from experienced entrepreneurs and specialists. - Business Skill Development: Master essential skills such as financial management, marketing strategies, and leadership abilities. - Networking Opportunities: Connect with investors, industry professionals, and fellow entrepreneurs. - Practical Learning: Learn through real-world case studies and hands-on business planning exercises. For More Information, Contact Us: info@upicon.in or call us at 0522 423 3727 Visit our website: UPICON e-Learnings
